name: The Father's Riddles
description:
Developer: Edlaine Ann S. Mercado  (2019)                                                                            Adviser: Lawrence Joseph T. Paculan 

Synopsis:                                                                                                                                                       

The Father’s Riddles is a 3D exploration game where the player plays as Samuwel, a lazy, dependent young man from the small village of Hignaroy. He is looking for his father, Alejo, who had just gone missing the night before.
